mapper.select: select m.movie_title, m.movie_no, c.cinema_name, c.cinema_region, t.theater_name, t.theater_total_seats, start_date, end_date, start_time, end_time, remaining_seats, movie_schedule_date_disc, movie_schedule_time_disc, movie_schedule_no from movie_schedule ms join theater t on ms.theater_no = t.theater_no join cinema c on t.cinema_no=c.cinema_no join movie m on m.movie_no= ms.movie_no order by m.movie_title asc

select m.movie_title, m.movie_no, c.cinema_name, c.cinema_region, t.theater_name, t.theater_total_seats, start_date, end_date, start_time, end_time, remaining_seats, movie_schedule_date_disc, movie_schedule_time_disc, movie_schedule_no from movie_schedule ms join theater t on ms.theater_no = t.theater_no join cinema c on t.cinema_no=c.cinema_no join movie m on m.movie_no= ms.movie_no where m.movie_no= #{movieNo} order by cinema_name asc

select m.movie_title, m.movie_no, c.cinema_name, c.cinema_region, t.theater_name, t.theater_total_seats, start_date, end_date, start_time, end_time, remaining_seats, movie_schedule_date_disc, movie_schedule_time_disc, movie_schedule_no from movie_schedule ms join theater t on ms.theater_no = t.theater_no join cinema c on t.cinema_no=c.cinema_no join movie m on m.movie_no= ms.movie_no where m.movie_no= #{movieNo} and cinema_name = #{cinemaName} order by m.movie_title asc

select m.movie_title, m.movie_no, c.cinema_name, c.cinema_region, t.theater_name, t.theater_total_seats, start_date, end_date, start_time, end_time, remaining_seats, movie_schedule_date_disc, movie_schedule_time_disc, movie_schedule_no from movie_schedule ms join theater t on ms.theater_no = t.theater_no join cinema c on t.cinema_no=c.cinema_no join movie m on m.movie_no= ms.movie_no where m.movie_no= #{movieNo} and cinema_name = #{cinemaName} and start_date = #{startDate} order by m.movie_title asc

SELECT MIN(m.movie_title) AS movie_title, m.movie_no FROM movie_schedule ms JOIN theater t ON ms.theater_no = t.theater_no JOIN cinema c ON t.cinema_no = c.cinema_no JOIN movie m ON m.movie_no = ms.movie_no GROUP BY m.movie_no ORDER BY MIN(c.cinema_name) ASC

SELECT DISTINCT c.cinema_name FROM movie_schedule ms JOIN theater t ON ms.theater_no = t.theater_no JOIN cinema c ON t.cinema_no = c.cinema_no JOIN movie m ON m.movie_no = ms.movie_no where m.movie_no = #{movieNo} ORDER BY c.cinema_name ASC
